1 -- StdLib (Standard Combinator Library)
    2 {-# Language BangPatterns #-}
    3 
    4 module Strappy.StdLib where
    5 import Debug.Trace
    6 
    7 import qualified Data.HashMap as HMap
    8 
    9 import qualified Strappy.CombMap as CM
   10 import Strappy.CombMap (CombMap)
   11 import Strappy.Type
   12 import Strappy.CL
   13 import Strappy.Expr
   14 import Strappy.Grammar
   15 import Strappy.Routers (cS, cB, cC, cSS, cSB, cSC, 
   16                   cBS, cBB, cBC, cCS, cCB, cCC,
   17                   cSSS, cBCB, routers)
   18 
   19 type NamedLib = HMap.Map String Comb
   20 
   21 -- | define some oft used type variables
   22 t0 = mkTVar 0 
   23 t1 = mkTVar 1
   24 t2 = mkTVar 2
   25 t3 = mkTVar 3
   26 t4 = mkTVar 4
   27 t5 = mkTVar 5
   28 t6 = mkTVar 6
   29 t7 = mkTVar 7
   30 t8 = mkTVar 8
   31 
   32  
   33 -- | define common combinators
   34 cI = CLeaf "I" (Func id) ( t0 ->- t0)
   35 cK = CLeaf "K" (Func $ \a -> Func $ \b -> a)   ( t0 ->- t1 ->- t0)
   36 -- cS = CLeaf "S" (Func $ \f -> Func $ \g -> Func $ \x -> (App (App f x) (App g x))) typeS 
   37 --     where typeS = (t2 ->- t1 ->- t0) ->- (t2 ->- t1) ->- (t2 ->- t0)
   38 
   39 -- cB = CLeaf "B" (Func $ \f -> Func $ \g -> Func $ \x -> (App f (App g x))) typeB 
   40 --     where typeB = (t1 ->- t0) ->- (t2 ->- t1) ->- (t2 ->- t0)
   41 
   42 -- cC = CLeaf "C" (Func $ \f -> Func $ \g -> Func $ \x -> (App (App f x) g )) typeC 
   43 --     where typeC = (t1 ->- t2 ->- t0) ->- (t2 ->- t1 ->- t0)
   44 
   45 -- cBCS = CLeaf "BCS" (Func $ \f 
   46 --                 -> Func $ \g 
   47 --                 -> Func $ \a 
   48 --                 -> Func $ \b 
   49 --                 -> Func $ \x 
   50 --                 -> ((App (App f b) (App (App g a) x)))) tp 
   51 --     where tp = (t1 ->- t2 ->- t0) ->- (t3 ->- t4 ->- t2) ->- t3 ->- t1 ->- t4 ->- t0
   52 
   53 -- cSS = CLeaf "SS" (Func $ \f 
   54 --                 -> Func $ \g 
   55 --                 -> Func $ \x1 
   56 --                 -> Func $ \x2
   57 --                 -> ((App (App x1 x2) (App x1 x2 )) tp 
   58 --     where tp = undefined
   59 
   60 -- cSS = CLeaf "SR" (Func $ \f 
   61 --                 -> Func $ \g 
   62 --                 -> Func $ \x1 
   63 --                 -> Func $ \x2
   64 --                 -> ((App (App x1 x2) (App x1 x2 )) tp 
   65 --     where tp = undefined
   66 
   67 -- cSS = CLeaf "SS" (Func $ \f 
   68 --                 -> Func $ \g 
   69 --                 -> Func $ \x1 
   70 --                 -> Func $ \x2
   71 --                 -> ((App (App x1 x2) (App x1 x2 )) tp 
   72 --     where tp = undefined
   73 
   74 -- cSS = CLeaf "SS" (Func $ \f 
   75 --                 -> Func $ \g 
   76 --                 -> Func $ \x1 
   77 --                 -> Func $ \x2
   78 --                 -> ((App (App x1 x2) (App x1 x2 )) tp 
   79 --     where tp = undefined
   80 
   81 -- cSS = CLeaf "SS" (Func $ \f 
   82 --                 -> Func $ \g 
   83 --                 -> Func $ \x1 
   84 --                 -> Func $ \x2
   85 --                 -> ((App (App x1 x2) (App x1 x2 )) tp 
   86 --     where tp = undefined
   87 
   88 -- cSS = CLeaf "SS" (Func $ \f 
   89 --                 -> Func $ \g 
   90 --                 -> Func $ \x1 
   91 --                 -> Func $ \x2
   92 --                 -> ((App (App x1 x2) (App x1 x2 )) tp 
   93 --     where tp = undefined
   94 
   95 
   96 
   97 cPrim = CLeaf "PrimRec" prim primType
   98         where prim = Func $ \c -> Func $ \f -> Func $ \(N i) ->
   99                       if
  100                          i <= 0 
  101                       then c
  102                       else (App f (App (App (App prim c) f) (N $ i - 1)))
  103               primType = t0 ->- ((t0 ->- t0) ->- tInt ->- t0)
  104 
  105 
  106 
  107 ----- Boolean Functions ---------
  108 
  109 -- Cond, Not, And, Or, XOr, Any, All
  110 
  111 cTrue = CLeaf "True" (B True) tBool
  112 cFalse = CLeaf "False" (B False) tBool
  113 
  114 cAnd = CLeaf "&" expr tp
  115     where expr = Func $ \(B x) -> Func $ \(B y) -> B ( x && y)
  116           tp = tBool ->- tBool ->- tBool
  117 cOr = CLeaf "|" expr tp
  118     where expr = Func $ \(B x) -> Func $ \(B y) -> B ( x || y)
  119           tp = tBool ->- tBool ->- tBool
  120 cNot = CLeaf "not" expr tp
  121     where expr = Func $ \(B x) -> B ( not x)
  122           tp = tBool ->- tBool
  123 cNand = CLeaf "nand" expr tp
  124     where expr = Func $ \(B x) -> Func $ \(B y) -> B ( not (x && y))
  125           tp = tBool ->- tBool ->- tBool
  126 
  127 
  128                
  129 cCond = CLeaf "Cond" expr tp
  130     where expr = Func $ \c -> Func $ \t -> Func $ \f
  131                  -> case c of
  132                       (B True) -> t
  133                       (B False) -> f
  134           tp = tBool ->- t0 ->- t0 ->- t0
  135 
  136 ----- Maybe Functions ----------
  137 
  138 cJust = CLeaf "Just" (Const "Just") tp
  139     where tp = t0 ->- (TAp tMaybe t0)
  140         
  141 cNothing = CLeaf "Nothing" (Const "Nothing") tp
  142     where tp = (TAp tMaybe t0)
  143 
  144 cFromJust = CLeaf "FromJust" expr t0
  145     where expr = Func $ \e -> case e of
  146                                 App (Const "Just") x -> x
  147                                 (Const "Nothing") 
  148                                      -> ExprError "FromJust applied to Nothing."
  149 
  150 ----- List Functions --------
  151 
  152 
  153 cCons = CLeaf ":" (Const ":") (t0 ->- (TAp tList t0) ->- (TAp tList t0))
  154 
  155 cHead = CLeaf "head" expr tp
  156     where expr = Func $ \xs -> case xs of
  157                                  (App (App (Const ":") x) y) -> x
  158                                  Const "[]" 
  159                                      -> ExprError "head applied to []"
  160           tp = (TAp tList t0) ->- t0
  161 
  162 cTail = CLeaf "tail" expr tp
  163     where expr = Func $ \xs -> case xs of
  164                                  (App (App (Const ":") x) y) -> y
  165                                  Const "[]" 
  166                                      -> ExprError "tail applied to []"
  167           tp = (TAp tList t0) ->- (TAp tList t0)
  168 
  169 cEmpty = CLeaf "[]" (Const "[]") (TAp tList t0)
  170 
  171 
  172 cIsEmpty = CLeaf "isEmpty" expr tp
  173     where expr = Func $ \xs -> case xs of
  174                                  Const "[]" -> (B True)
  175                                  otherwise -> (B False)
  176           tp = (TAp tList t0) ->- tBool
  177 
  178 
  179 ------ Tuple Functions ----------
  180 
  181 cPair = CLeaf "pair" (Const "pair") (t0 ->- t0 ->- TAp tPair t0)
  182 cFst = CLeaf "fst" expr tp
  183        where expr = Func $ \pr -> case pr of
  184                                     (App (App (Const "pair") x) y) -> x
  185                                     otherwise -> error "Error in cFst"
  186              tp = (TAp tPair t0) ->- t0
  187 
  188 cSnd = CLeaf "snd" expr tp
  189        where expr = Func $ \pr -> case pr of
  190                                     (App (App (Const "pair") x) y) -> y
  191                                     otherwise -> error "Error in cFst"
  192              tp = (TAp tPair t0) ->- t0
  193 
  194 cTriple = CLeaf "triple" (Const "triple") 
  195            (t0 ->- t0 ->- t0 ->- TAp tTriple t0)
  196 
  197 cFst3 = CLeaf "fst3" expr tp
  198         where expr = Func $ \tr -> case tr of
  199                                     (App (App (App (Const "triple") x) y) z) -> x
  200                                     otherwise -> error "Error in cFst3"
  201               tp = (TAp tTriple t0) ->- t0
  202 cSnd3 = CLeaf "snd3" expr tp
  203         where expr = Func $ \tr -> case tr of
  204                                     (App (App (App (Const "triple") x) y) z) -> y
  205                                     otherwise -> error "Error in cFst3"
  206               tp = (TAp tTriple t0) ->- t0
  207 cThrd3 = CLeaf "thrd3" expr tp
  208         where expr = Func $ \tr -> case tr of
  209                                     (App (App (App (Const "triple") x) y) z) -> y
  210                                     otherwise -> error "Error in cThrd3"
  211               tp = (TAp tTriple t0) ->- t0
  212 
  213 cQuad = CLeaf "quad" (Const "quad") 
  214            (t0 ->- t0 ->- t0 ->- TAp tTriple t0)
  215 cFst4 = CLeaf "fst4" expr tp
  216         where expr = Func $ \tr -> case tr of
  217                                     (App (App (App (App (Const "quad") x) y) z) w) -> x
  218                                     otherwise -> error "Error in cFst4"
  219               tp = (TAp tTriple t0) ->- t0
  220 cSnd4 = CLeaf "snd4" expr tp
  221         where expr = Func $ \tr -> case tr of
  222                                     (App (App (App (App (Const "quad") x) y) z) w) -> y
  223                                     otherwise -> error "Error in cSnd4"
  224               tp = (TAp tTriple t0) ->- t0
  225 cThrd4 = CLeaf "thrd4" expr tp
  226         where expr = Func $ \tr -> case tr of
  227                                     (App (App (App (App (Const "quad") x) y) z) w) -> z
  228                                     otherwise -> error "Error in cThrd4"
  229               tp = (TAp tTriple t0) ->- t0
  230 cFrth4 = CLeaf "frth4" expr tp
  231         where expr = Func $ \tr -> case tr of
  232                                     (App (App (App (App (Const "quad") x) y) z) w) -> w
  233                                     otherwise -> error "Error in cFrth4"
  234               tp = (TAp tTriple t0) ->- t0
  235 
  236 stdlib' :: NamedLib
  237 stdlib' = (CM.fromList $ 
  238          [
  239            ("I", cI)
  240 --         , ("K", cK)
  241 --         , ("cond", cCond)
  242         , ("True", cTrue)
  243         , ("False", cFalse)
  244 --         , ("|", cOr)
  245 --         , ("&", cAnd)
  246 --         , ("not", cNot)
  247 --         , ("<", cLT)
  248 --         , (">", cGT)
  249 --         , ("==", cEQ)
  250           , ("+", dOp2C "+" (+))
  251 --          , ("-", dOp2C "-" (-))
  252            , ("*", dOp2C "*" (*))
  253           ,  ("0", num2C 0)
  254           ,  ("1", num2C 1)
  255 --          , ("2", num2C 2)
  256 --         , ("3", num2C 3)
  257 --         , ("4", num2C 4)
  258 --           , ("primRec", cPrim) 
  259 --           , (":", cCons)
  260 --           , ("[]", cEmpty)
  261 --            , ("head", cHead)
  262 --            , ("tail", cTail)
  263 --            , ("isEmpty", cIsEmpty)
  264           , ("pair", cPair)
  265           , ("fst", cFst)
  266           , ("snd", cSnd)
  267           , ("triple", cTriple)
  268           , ("fst3", cFst3)
  269           , ("snd3", cSnd3)
  270           , ("thrd3", cThrd3)
  271            ]) 
  272            `CM.union` routers
  273 
  274 stdgrammar = Grammar lib c
  275     where lib  = CM.fromList $ [(c, (-3::Double)) | c <- CM.elems stdlib']
  276           c = 0 -- (-2)
  277 
  278
